We assertively develop new ideas and proposal to our clients

classification.rationale: The job description lists various software engineering roles (Android, iOS, PHP, Node.js, Frontend) and infrastructure/operations tasks. There is no mention of GenAI specific technologies, models, or techniques. The focus is on traditional software development and operations, not Generative AI.
